attributes.action: call a general election immidiately. We the undersigned have lost trust in the House of Commons MPs.  Their inappropriate behaviour over MPs expenses has called into question the integrity of the UK Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has been created due to the significant lack of trust and confidence of the House of Commons sitting MPs. Over the last four or more years MPs have been in involved in a number of scandals whether it's cash for peerages or more recently misuse of MPs expenses that are funded by hard working tax payers.
It is now time for the people of this country to say enough is enough and we will not tolerate this kind of questionable behaviour from MPs.  Therefore we call for the dissolution of  Parliament so the people can restore integrity to our country and to the House of Commons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
